moon.course.question

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • moon.course.question.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OpenQuestion, TfQuestion

    public abstract class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This abstract class is inherited by all the different question types. In this class we store the text of the question, the relevance, the reference to the exercise it belongs to and the answers of the students (studentMarks)
    Author:
    Juan Riera and Lucia Asencio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
